title: Zola | Official Trailer HD | A24
author: A24
description:
SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/A24subscribe

From writer/director Janicza Bravo and based on #TheStory by A’Ziah “Zola” King. Starring Taylour Paige, Riley Keough, Nicholas Braun, and Colman Domingo. ZOLA – In Theaters This Summer. #Zola

RELEASE DATE: In Theaters This Summer
DIRECTED BY: Janicza Bravo
WRITTEN BY: Janicza Bravo and Jeremy O. Harris
CAST: Taylour Paige, Riley Keough, Nicholas Braun, and Colman Domingo

Follow Zola on Instagram: http://bit.ly/Zola_Instagram
Like Zola on Facebook: http://bit.ly/Zola_Facebook
Follow Zola on Twitter: http://bit.ly/Zola_Twitter

------

ABOUT A24:
The studio behind MOONLIGHT, LADY BIRD, EX MACHINA, THE WITCH, EIGHTH GRADE, HEREDITARY & more.

Coming Soon: The Green Knight

Subscribe to A24's NEWSLETTER:  http://bit.ly/A24signup

关于A24。

A24是《月光》、《LADY BIRD》、《EX MACHINA》、《THE WITCH》、《EIGHTH GRADE》、《HEREDITARY》等作品的幕后工作室。
